010package imagingbook.pub.sift.scalespace;
011
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.ImageStack;
014import imagingbook.lib.util.LinearContainer;
015import imagingbook.lib.util.PrintsToStream;
016
017import java.io.PrintStream;
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020/**
021 * Represents a stack of scale levels within an octave. Basically this is 
022 * only an array with flexible bottom and top index.
023 */
024public abstract class ScaleOctave implements PrintsToStream {
025        
026        protected double sigma_0 = 1.6; // TODO: make field final
027        protected final int Q;                  // number of levels per doubling scale factor
028        protected final int p;                  // octave index
029        protected final int width, height;
030        protected final int botLevelIndex, topLevelIndex;       
031        protected final LinearContainer<ScaleLevel> levels;
032        
033        ScaleOctave (int p, int Q, int width, int height, int botLevelIndex, int topLevelIndex) {
034                this.p = p;
035                this.Q = Q;
036                this.width = width;
037                this.height = height;
038                if (botLevelIndex > topLevelIndex) 
039                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("ScaleOctave (constructor): botLevelIndex > topLevelIndex");
040                this.botLevelIndex = botLevelIndex;
041                this.topLevelIndex = topLevelIndex;
042                levels = new LinearContainer<ScaleLevel>(botLevelIndex, topLevelIndex);
043        }
044        
045        /* Create a scale octave from a given bottom level level_b
046         */
047        ScaleOctave (int p, int Q, ScaleLevel level_b, int botIndex, int topIndex) {
048                this(p, Q, level_b.getWidth(), level_b.getHeight(), botIndex, topIndex);
049                this.setLevel(botIndex, level_b);
050        }
051        
052        public int getOctaveIndex() {
053                return p;
054        }
055        
056        public int getWidth() {
057                return width;
058        }
059        
060        public int getHeight() {
061                return height;
062        }
063        
064        public ScaleLevel getLevel(int q) {     // TODO: honor bottom level, check q
065                return levels.getElement(q);
066        }
067        
068        void setLevel(int q, ScaleLevel level) {        // TODO: check q
069                levels.setElement(q, level);
070        }
071        
072        public boolean isInside(int q, int u, int v) {
073                return (botLevelIndex < q && q < topLevelIndex &&
074                                0 < u && u < width-1 && 
075                                0 < v && v < height-1);
076        }
077        
078        public double getAbsoluteScale(int q) {
079                return getLevel(q).getAbsoluteScale();
080        }
081        
082        int getBottomLevelIndex() {
083                return botLevelIndex;
084        }
085        
086        int getTopLevelIndex() {
087                return topLevelIndex;
088        }
089        
090        
091        /*
092         * Collects and returns the 3x3x3 neighborhood values from this octave 
093         * at scale level q and center position u,v. The result is stored
094         * in the given 3x3x3 array nh[s][x][y], to which a reference is returned.
095         */
096        public void getNeighborhood(int q, int u, int v, final float[][][] nh) {
097                // nh[s][x][y]
098                for (int s = 0, level = q - 1; s < 3; s++, level++) {
099                        getLevel(level).get3x3Neighborhood(u, v, nh[s]);
100                }
101        }
102        
103        // ---------------------------------------------------------
104        
105        // for debugging only:
106        @Override
107        public void printToStream(PrintStream strm) {
108                strm.println("  Scale Octave p=" + p);
109                for (int q = botLevelIndex; q <= topLevelIndex; q++) {
110                        ScaleLevel level = getLevel(q);
111                        if (level != null) {
112                                double scale = level.getAbsoluteScale();
113                                strm.format(Locale.US, "   level (p=%d, q=%d, scale=%.4f)\n", p, q, scale);
114                        }
115                }
116        }
117        
118        public void show(String name, int p) {
119                for (int q = botLevelIndex; q <= topLevelIndex; q++) {
120                        ScaleLevel level = getLevel(q);
121                        if (level != null) {
122                                double scale = level.getAbsoluteScale();
123                                //String title = name + " (q=" + q + ") " + String.format(Locale.US, "\u03C3=%.3f", scale);
124                                String title = String.format(Locale.US, "%s (p=%d, q=%d, \u03C3=%.4f)", name, p, q, scale);
125                                // IjDisplay.showProcessor(level, title, 0, 255);
126                                //IjUtils.showProcessor(level, title);
127                                level.resetMinAndMax();
128                                (new ImagePlus(title, level)).show();
129                        }
130                }
131        }
132        
133        public void showAsStack(String name) {
134                ImageStack stk = new ImageStack(width, height);
135                for (int q = botLevelIndex; q <= topLevelIndex; q++) {
136                        ScaleLevel level = getLevel(q);
137                        if (level != null) {
138                                double scale = level.getAbsoluteScale();
139                                String title = String.format(Locale.US, "q=%d, \u03C3=%.4f", q, scale);
140                                stk.addSlice(title, level);
141                        }
142                }
143                (new ImagePlus(name,stk)).show();
144        }
145        
146        public void showAsStack(String name, int p) {
147                ImageStack stk = new ImageStack(width, height);
148                for (int q = botLevelIndex; q <= topLevelIndex; q++) {
149                        ScaleLevel level = getLevel(q);
150                        if (level != null) {
151                                double scale = level.getAbsoluteScale();
152                                String title = String.format(Locale.US, "p=%d, q=%d, \u03C3=%.4f", p, q, scale);
153                                stk.addSlice(title, level);
154                        }
155                }
156                (new ImagePlus(name,stk)).show();
157        }
158        
159
160        public int getScaleIndex(int p, int q) {
161                int m = Q * p + q; 
162                return m;
163        }
164        
165        public double getAbsoluteScale(int p, int q) {
166                double m = getScaleIndex(p, q);
167                double sigma = sigma_0 * Math.pow(2, m/Q);
168                return sigma;
169        }
170        
171//      public double getRelativeScale(double scaleA, double scaleB) {  // scaleA <= scaleB
172//              return Math.sqrt(scaleB*scaleB - scaleA*scaleA);
173//      }
174//      
175//      public int getOctaveIndex() {
176//              return p;
177//      }
178        
179}
